Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions

Class InitChooseLeaderCards

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.Action
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.InitChooseLeaderCards
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class InitChooseLeaderCards
extends Action
InitChooseLeaderCards Class defines data and methods used to give to the player the two Leader Cards he chooses at the beginning of the game.

Attributes:

  • RedLeaderCard "leaderCard1": first Leader Card chose by the player
  • RedLeaderCard "leaderCard2": second Leader Card chose by the player
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • isCorrect

      public boolean isCorrect() throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Checks if the Action parameters are correct by assuring that the two specified Leader Cards are not of null value.
      Overrides:
      isCorrect in class Action
      Returns:
      true if neither of the two cards equal to null.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if at least one Leader Card is equal to null.

    • messagePrepare

      public MessageToClient messagePrepare​(ActionController actionController)
      Description copied from class: Action
      Prepares a message to be sent to the Client after a certain request. Each Action SubClass creates a different MessageToClient-Object to be later serialized and sent.
      Overrides:
      messagePrepare in class Action
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      A MessageToClient subclass containing all information needed to update the client's Reduced Model.
